description: End-to-end purchase management workflow for a manufacturing company covering requisition to payment, including approvals, sourcing, PO issuance, supplier fulfillment, receiving, quality inspection, invoice matching, and payment release. Designed for traceability, SLA monitoring via planned vs actual dates, and audit-ready documentation.

sheets.name: Purchase Workflow Register

columns.name: Purchase Case ID
columns.description: Unique end-to-end purchase workflow identifier (primary key)

columns.name: Current Stage
columns.description: System-calculated or user-updated current stage name

columns.name: Stage1 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 1 group (e.g., #E3F2FD)

columns.name: Required By Date
columns.description: Date by which material/service is required

columns.name: Estimated Unit Price
columns.description: Estimated unit price at PR stage

columns.name: Estimated Total Value
columns.description: Estimated total value at PR stage

columns.name: Stage2 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 2 group (e.g., #E8F5E9)

columns.name: Stage3 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 3 group (e.g., #FFF3E0)

columns.name: Stage4 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 4 group (e.g., #F3E5F5)

columns.name: Stage5 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 5 group (e.g., #E0F7FA)

columns.name: Stage6 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 6 group (e.g., #FCE4EC)

columns.name: Stage7 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 7 group (e.g., #EDE7F6)

columns.name: Stage8 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 8 group (e.g., #F1F8E9)

columns.name: Stage9 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 9 group (e.g., #FFFDE7)

columns.name: Stage10 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 10 group (e.g., #E1F5FE)

columns.name: Stage11 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 11 group (e.g., #F9FBE7)

columns.name: Stage12 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 12 group (e.g., #E8EAF6)

columns.name: Stage13 Color
columns.description: Visual color tag for Stage 13 group (e.g., #E0F2F1)

columns.name: Overall Delay Days
columns.description: Total delay across stages = SUM(Delay1:Delay13) where numeric

columns.name: Last Updated By
columns.description: User who last updated the record

stages.stage_description: Initiation of demand by user/department with item, quantity, required date, and justification.
Approval of PR as per delegation of authority and budget availability.
RFQ creation and distribution; shortlist eligible vendors based on category, compliance, and capability.
Evaluate quotations (commercial + technical), negotiate, and finalize recommended vendor.
Internal approval of PO terms, pricing, taxes, and delivery schedule.
Issue approved PO to supplier with delivery schedule and terms.
Supplier confirms acceptance of PO, delivery date, and quantities.
Supplier dispatches goods; logistics tracking until arrival at plant/warehouse.
Physical receipt of goods and creation of GRN with quantity verification.
Quality checks performed; accept/reject with NCR if required.
Invoice received and matched against PO and GRN; resolve variances.
Finance approval and payment execution as per terms; capture payment reference.
Close purchase case; record supplier performance and lessons learned.

sheets.description: Main workflow tracking sheet for each purchase cycle (PR to closure) with sequential stages and SLA delay calculations.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Master list of items/materials/services used for PR/PO creation and validation.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Supplier master data including compliance and payment details.

sheets.name: PlantWarehouse Master
sheets.description: Plants and warehouses for delivery/receiving locations.

sheets.name: Cost Center Master
sheets.description: Cost centers for budgeting and reporting.

sheets.name: GLAccount Master
sheets.description: General ledger / account codes for posting and reporting.

sheets.name: Tax Master
sheets.description: Tax codes and rates for purchase transactions.

sheets.name: Incoterms Master
sheets.description: Incoterms reference for logistics and responsibility split.

sheets.name: Approval Matrix
sheets.description: Approval rules by purchase type, value thresholds, plant, and role.

sheets.name: Status Master
sheets.description: Standard statuses for workflow and stage outcomes.

sheets.name: Document Repository Index

columns.name: Purchase Case ID
columns.description: Foreign key to Purchase Workflow Register

sheets.description: Index of documents linked to each purchase case for audit and retrieval.

sheets.name: Import Dump - PRPOGRNInvoice
sheets.description: Optional import/dump sheet for bulk upload from ERP or external systems; to be validated and posted into the main register.
